pages.text: Virentium is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Virentium can be obtained by crafting together netherite scrap and gaianite.$(br2)Gaianite ore can be found in a triangle pattern in the lush caves, between Y=20 and Y=-64. Can also be obtained via gaia lilies.

pages.title: Virentium
pages.text: Virentium holds the power of the lush caves.
The smithing template drops from Gob, King of Gnomes and the Super Sniffer, and must be used on netherite to upgrade.
